content: DETROIT - Nov 20 The head of Daimler AG's  commercial truck operation told Reuters Friday the company will invest $375 million at a complex near Detroit to build diesel engines for medium duty trucks  expanding a strategy of building and selling trucks  engines  transmissions and axles as a package.
name: PACCAR Inc
title: UPDATE 1-Daimler to invest $375 mln to build diesel engines
